name: Space Hunters - a reEnvisioned Bullet Hell
name_original: Space Hunters - a reEnvisioned Bullet Hell
description:
"The story of this game started with Space Invader.

It ended with a beautiful bullet hell."

Let's be honest here: If you just want to beat this game, it may take you no more than 30 Minutes. But this time will be loaded with fun, close calls, disturbing aliens, and nerve wrecking Action. It will be half an hour that is worth the time spent.

Also, here is some more game play footage.


Note, the game is built for Full-HD resolution.

Playing it on other resolutions may result in deformations of the interface.
